i18n.longDescription:
When history tells the story of the Fifth Blight, what will be said about the hero who turned the tide against the darkspawn? Determine your legacy and fight for Thedas as a noble dwarf, an elf far from home, a mage apprentice, or a customized hero of your own design. Experience many unique origin stories on your quest to unite the kingdoms and defeat an ancient evil.

Determine your origin. Customize your hero's physical appearance and character alignment, but choose wisely. Your race and combat class will define your origin, both within Thedas and beyond. Choices determine where you begin your journey and future interactions.

Build loyalty. Recruit over a half-dozen party members, including mages, deadly assassins, a berzerker dwarf, and a warrior from the giant Qunari race. With so many different personalities, you'll have to watch your words to build trust, loyalty, and maybe even romance.

Make every move count. Combine your own moves with those of your teammates to build a melee attack. Fight in real-time with hard-hitting strikes, or assign individual orders to teammates for a more tactical approach.

Ultimate Edition Includes:

Awakening Expansion Pack: Become the commander of the Grey Wardens and embark on a new campaign in the world of Amaranthine. You'll fight new enemies, learn new spells, and fend off the advancing Darkspawn forces.

Nine Content Packs to add new quests, spells, abilities, and in-game items to your adventure. (Full List: The Stone Prisoner, Warden's Keep, Return to Ostagar, Feastday Gifts, Lailana's Song, The Darkspawn Chronicles, The Golems of Amgarrak, Witch Hunt, and the Blood Dragon Armor for use in Dragon Age: Origins and Mass Effect 2.)
i18n.onlineDisclaimer: EA Account, registration with enclosed serial code, Internet connection and acceptance of End User License Agreement required to play and to access online features and/or services. EA Online PRIVACY POLICY AND TERMS of service can be found at WWW.EA.COM. You must be 13+ to register for an EA Account. EA may provide certain incremental content and/or updates for no additional charge, if and when available. EA MAY RETIRE ONLINE FEATURES AFTER 30 DAYS NOTICE POSTED ON WWW.EA.COM/2/SERVICE-UPDATES.
i18n.shortDescription: Only You Can Defeat this Evil
i18n.systemRequirements:
MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

OS: Windows XP (SP3) or Windows Vista (SP1) or Windows 7

Processor: Intel Core 2 SINGLE 1.6 Ghz Processor or equivalent / AMD 64 2.0 Ghz Processor or equivalent

Memory: 1 GB (1.5 GB Vista and Windows 7)

Hard Drive: 24 GB HD space

DVD Drive: DVD Rom drive required

Video Card: ATI Radeon X850 256MB or greater / NVIDIA GeForce 6600 GT 128MB or greater. Vista & Windows 7: Radeon X1550 256MB / NVIDIA GeForce 7600 GT 256MB

Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c Compatible Sound Card


RECOMMENDED SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

OS: Windows XP (SP3) or Windows Vista (SP1) or Windows 7

Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 2.4 Ghz Processor or equivalent / AMD Phenom II X3 Triple-Core 2.8 GHz or equivalent

Memory: 2 GB (XP) or 4 GB (Vista/Win7)

Hard Drive: 24 GB HD space

DVD Drive: DVD Rom drive required

Video Card: ATI 3850 512MB or greater / NVIDIA 8800GTS 512MB or greater

Sound Card: Direct X 9.0c Compatible Sound Card

itemName: Dragon Age Origins Ultimate Edition - PC - WW (Origin) (RTP)
